## Online {#manual-get-online}

During the beta testing phase, the application is hosted on Shinyapps.io: [https://aldomann.shinyapps.io/biodose-tools-beta/](https://aldomann.shinyapps.io/biodose-tools-beta/). 

Biodose Tools will be later hosted at one of our institution's servers.

```{r echo=FALSE, out.width = '60%', fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics("images/user-manual/browsers.png", dpi = 96)
```

Biodose Tools has been througly tested to be supported by the following web browsers:

- Google Chrome.
- Firefox.
- Microsoft Edge.
- Safari.
